OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

MISP_SSL_VERIFY.description: Whether to check if the SSL certificate is valid when using `HTTPS` protocol or not.

MISP_CLIENT_CERT.description: Filepath to the client certificate to use for MISP API calls. Required if `ssl_verify` is enabled.

MISP_REFERENCE_URL.description: MISP base URL used for External References

MISP_CREATE_REPORTS.description: Whether to create reports for each imported MISP event or not.

MISP_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: Whether to create an indicator for each imported MISP attribute or not.

MISP_CREATE_OBSERVABLES.description: Whether to create an observable for each imported MISP attribute or not.

MISP_CREATE_OBJECT_OBSERVABLES.description: Whether to create a text observable for each MISP Event's object or not.

MISP_DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE.description: The attribute to use as MISP events date.

MISP_DATE_FILTER_FIELD.description: The attribute to use as filter to query new MISP events by date.

MISP_REPORT_DESCRIPTION_ATTRIBUTE_FILTER.description: Filter to use to find the attribute that will be used for report description (example: 'type=comment,category=Internal reference')

MISP_CREATE_TAGS_AS_LABELS.description: Whether to create labels from MISP tags or not.

MISP_GUESS_THREATS_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to **guess** and create Threats from MISP tags or not.

MISP_AUTHOR_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to create Authors from MISP tags or not.

MISP_MARKINGS_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to create Markings from MISP tags or not.

MISP_KEEP_ORIGINAL_TAGS_AS_LABEL.description: List of original MISP tags to keep as labels.

MISP_ENFORCE_WARNING_LIST.description: Whether to enforce the warning list for MISP events or not.

MISP_REPORT_TYPE.description: The type of report to create on OpenCTI from MISP events.

MISP_IMPORT_FROM_DATE.description: A date (ISO-8601) from which to start importing MISP events (based on events creation date).

MISP_IMPORT_TAGS.description: List of tags to filter MISP events to import, **including** only events with these tags.

MISP_IMPORT_TAGS_NOT.description: List of tags to filter MISP events to import, **excluding** events with these tags.

MISP_IMPORT_CREATOR_ORGS.description: List of organization identifiers to filter MISP events to import, **including** only events created by these organizations.

MISP_IMPORT_CREATOR_ORGS_NOT.description: List of organization identifiers to filter MISP events to import, **excluding** events created by these organizations.

MISP_IMPORT_OWNER_ORGS.description: List of organization identifiers to filter MISP events to import, **including** only events owned by these organizations.

MISP_IMPORT_OWNER_ORGS_NOT.description: List of organization identifiers to filter MISP events to import, **excluding** events owned by these organizations.

MISP_IMPORT_KEYWORD.description: Keyword to use as filter to import MISP events.

MISP_IMPORT_DISTRIBUTION_LEVELS.description: List of distribution levels to filter MISP events to import, **including** only events with these distribution levels.

MISP_IMPORT_THREAT_LEVELS.description: List of threat levels to filter MISP events to import, **including** only events with these threat levels.

MISP_IMPORT_ONLY_PUBLISHED.description: Whether to only import published MISP events or not.

MISP_IMPORT_WITH_ATTACHMENTS.description: Whether to import attachment attribute content as a file (works only with PDF).

MISP_IMPORT_TO_IDS_NO_SCORE.description: A score value for the indicator/observable if the attribute `to_ids` value is no.

MISP_IMPORT_UNSUPPORTED_OBSERVABLES_AS_T.description: Whether to import unsupported observable as x_opencti_text or not.
Whether to import unsupported observable as x_opencti_text or not (just with the value).

MISP_PROPAGATE_LABELS.description: Whether to apply labels from MISP events to OpenCTI observables on top of MISP Attribute labels or not.

MISP_BATCH_COUNT.description: The max batch count for splitting bundles into batches
